author: Nintendo of America
description:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO is available now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/dragon-ball-sparking-zero-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01

KAMEHAMEHA! Triumph over your foes in high-speed, 3D battles with teams of up to five characters from across Dragon Ball history. Using the largest roster in the franchise with over 180 playable characters, players relive iconic moments and unlock brand-new encounters. Charge up your energy to activate Sparking! Mode, which grants your character access to their signature devastating attack. Create dream scenarios in Custom Battle or prove you are the strongest by challenging your friends in a variety of Versus modes.  

#DragonBallSparkingZero #NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com
title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
